database.title: DHCP Server Leases
database.p: A database with this schema holds the leases information of the DHCP server.
database.table:
List of the leases information of DHCP server. Number of records correspond to the number of DHCP clients or hosts that got assigned the IP address by the DHCP server.
Specifies the expiry time of the DHCP lease entry in epoch format. Example: 1440997908.
Specifies the Ethernet MAC address of the DHCP client to which IP address is assigned by the DHCP server. Example: e6:8c:98:bb:b4:de.
Specifies the IPv4/IPv6 address that got assigned to the DHCP client. Example IPv4 address: 192.168.10.27.
Specifies the hostname of the DHCP client to which IP address is assigned by the DHCP server.
Specifies the client id of the DHCP client to which IP address is assigned by the DHCP server.
